message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $16,000, given the value of the product. This is a fair price that reflects both of our interests.  Let me know what you think.
